LinkedIn Profile :

Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love to have an opportunity to get industry experience in cybersecurity, networking, or programming. I could then integrate what I learn into my students' classroom experience helping them be more prepared for future work.

	* Remote	* Hybrid	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : erikkendall@u.boisestate.edu
	* Secondary Email : erik.m.kendall@gmail.com
	* Phone : 2088805160
	* Communication & Availability : After 3pm
Applicant : Kendall, Erik
School (district) : Caldwell High School (Caldwell)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : www.linkedin.com/in/erikmkendall

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love to have an opportunity to get industry experience in cybersecurity, networking, or programming. I could then integrate what I learn into my students' classroom experience helping them be more prepared for future work.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Math
	* Chemistry
	* Physics

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 7
	* 8
	* 9
	* 10
	* 11
	* 12
	* Postsecondary



STEM Domain Experience
	* Chemistry
	* Physics
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Cybersecurity

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:

	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Math
	* Chemistry
	* Physics

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 7
	* 8
	* 9
	* 10
	* 11
	* 12
	* Postsecondary

	* Chemistry
	* Physics
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Cybersecurity

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love to have an opportunity to get industry experience in cybersecurity, networking, or programming. I could then integrate what I learn into my students' classroom experience helping them be more prepared for future work.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Math
	* Chemistry
	* Physics

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love to have an opportunity to get industry experience in cybersecurity, networking, or programming. I could then integrate what I learn into my students' classroom experience helping them be more prepared for future work.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)
